mapper.select:
SELECT /* PERCENT_CHAR_ALLOWED */ TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(T1.SAP_CD)) AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , T1.SAP_GRP /* 자재그룹 */ , T1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , T1.ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , T1.ITM_PD_ABBR1 /* 품목상품약어명 */ , T1.ITM_KND /* 품목종류코드 */ , T1.ITM_KND_NM /* 품목종류 */ , T1.DEL_UNT /* 출고단위코드 */ , T1.DEL_UNT_NM /* 출고단위 */ , T1.IMG_URL /* 이미지URL */ , T1.APLD_FR /* 사용시작일 */ , T1.APLD_TO /* 사용중지일 */ , T1.BOX_QTY /* 박스수량 */ , T1.LEAD_TIME /* 리드타임 */ , NVL(T2.CENTER_QTY, 0) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터A등급 재고 */ , NVL(T2.MY_CENTER_QTY, 0) AS MY_CENTER_QTY /* 조직창고 수량 */ , NVL(T2.INDI_STCK_QTY, 0) AS INDI_STCK_QTY /* 개인창고 수량 */ , 0 AS LGST_QTY /* 물류재고 */ FROM ( SELECT S1.SVPD_SAP_CD AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , S1.SVPD_SAP_GRP AS SAP_GRP /* 자재그룹 */ , S1.SVPD_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , S1.SVPD_NM_KOR AS ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , S1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS ITM_PD_ABBR1 /* 품목상품약어명 */ , S1.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND /* 품목종류코드 */ , S1.SVPD_ITEM_KND_NM AS ITM_KND_NM /* 품목종류 */ , S1.SVPD_DEL_UNT AS DEL_UNT /* 출고단위코드 */ , S1.SVPD_DEL_UNT_NM AS DEL_UNT_NM /* 출고단위 */ , S1.SVPD_IMG_URL AS IMG_URL /* 이미지URL */ , S1.SVPD_APLD_FR AS APLD_FR /* 사용시작일 */ , S1.SVPD_APLD_TO AS APLD_TO /* 사용중지일 */ , S1.SVPD_BOX_QTY AS BOX_QTY /* 박스수량 */ , S1.SVPD_LT AS LEAD_TIME /* 리드타임 */ FROM ( ) S1
AND S1.SVPD_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND S1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKndCd}
AND ( S1.SVPD_ITEM_GR = #{itmGrpCd} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T2.PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.PD_REL_TP_CD = '14' /* AS부품 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T1.OJ_PD_CD = S1.SVPD_PD_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T1.VL_STRT_DTM AND T1.VL_END_DTM AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{itmGrpCd} ) )
AND S1.SVPD_PART_GR = #{svMatGrpCd}
AND S1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 LIKE '%' || #{itmPdNm} || '%' ESCAPE '\'
AND S1.SVPD_PD_CD LIKE #{itmPdCd}||'%'
AND S1.SVPD_SAP_CD >= LPAD(#{strtSapCd}, 18, '0')
AND S1.SVPD_SAP_CD <= LPAD(#{endSapCd}, 18, '0')
AND S1.SVPD_SAP_CD IS NOT NULL
) T1 /* 상품 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(CASE WHEN D1.WARE_NO <> '100002' AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} AND D2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = CASE #{wareDvCd} WHEN '2' THEN '20' WHEN '3' THEN '30' END THEN D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END) AS CENTER_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN D1.WARE_NO = NVL(D3.HGR_WARE_NO, D4.HGR_WARE_NO) THEN D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END) AS MY_CENTER_QTY , SUM(CASE WHEN D2.HGR_WARE_NO = NVL(D3.HGR_WARE_NO, D4.HGR_WARE_NO) THEN D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END) AS INDI_STCK_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(HGR_WARE_NO) AS HGR_WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND HGR_WARE_NO NOT LIKE '1%' ) D3 ON 1 = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('20', '30') THEN WARE_NO ELSE HGR_WARE_NO END AS HGR_WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{wareNo} ) D4 ON 1 = 1 WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) T2 ON T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ORDER BY T1.ITM_PD_CD

SELECT /* PERCENT_CHAR_ALLOWED */ D1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(D1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , D1.PD_NM AS ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , D1.PD_ABBR_NM AS ITM_PD_NM1 /* 품목상품약어명 */ , D8.FILE_UID AS IMG_URL /* 이미지URL */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITEM_KND /* 품목종류 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL12 AS BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL05 AS MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , D2.PD_PRP_VAL11 AS DEL_UNT /* 신청단위 */ , NVL(D3.WAREHOUSE_QTY, 0) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 출고창고재고 */ , NVL(D3.CENTER_QTY, 0) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터A등급재고(조직) */ , NVL(D3.CENTER_B_QTY, 0) AS CENTER_B_QTY /* 센터B등급재고(조직) */ , NVL(D4.INDI_QTY, 0) AS INDI_QTY /* 개인수량 */ , NVL(D5.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY /* 당월사용수량 */ , NVL(D6.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY_P /* 전월사용수량 */ , NVL(D7.USE_QTY, 0) AS USE_QTY_Y /* 전년도사용수량 */ , GREATEST(NVL(D5.USE_QTY, 0) - NVL(D3.CENTER_QTY, 0), 0) AS SHORT_SUPPLY /* 신청 예상수량 (전월 - 센터) */ , ( SELECT /*+ USE_NL(S1 S2) INDEX(S2 PK_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ) */ NVL(SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY), 0) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ S1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON S2.WARE_NO = S1.WARE_NO WHERE S1.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND S2.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND S2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' ) AS TOTAL_QTY /* 총재고 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D1 /* 상품기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D2 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D2.PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN #{ostrWareDvCd} = '1' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END END) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 출고창고재고 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{wareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY END) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터A등급재고(조직) */ , SUM(CASE WHEN WARE_NO = #{wareNo} THEN PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY END) AS CENTER_B_QTY /* 센터B등급재고(조직) */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO IN ( #{wareNo}, #{ostrWareNo} ) GROUP BY ITM_PD_CD ) D3 ON D3.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(D2 (APY_YM, WARE_DV_CD, HGR_WARE_NO)) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , SUM(D1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS INDI_QTY /* 개인수량 */ , SUM(D1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY) AS INDI_B_QTY /* 개인B수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D4 ON D4.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(D1 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY /* 당월사용수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D5 ON D5.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(D1 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) INDEX(D2 (APY_YM, WARE_DV_CD, HGR_WARE_NO)) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY /* 전월사용수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D6 ON D6.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(D1 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) INDEX(D2 (APY_YM, WARE_DV_CD, HGR_WARE_NO)) */ D1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(D1.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY /* 전년도사용수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ D1 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON D2.WARE_NO = D1.WK_WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12), 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND D2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND D2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} GROUP BY D1.ITM_PD_CD ) D7 ON D7.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D D8 /* 첨부파일상세 */ ON D8.ATTH_DOC_ID = D1.IMG_APN_FILE_ID AND D8.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D8.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND ( D2.PD_PRP_VAL32 IS NULL OR D2.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' )
AND D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd}
AND ( D2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{itmGrpCd} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_REL S1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL S2 ON S2.PD_CD = S1.BASE_PD_CD WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.PD_REL_TP_CD = '14' /* AS부품 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND S1.OJ_PD_CD = D2.PD_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN S1.VL_STRT_DTM AND S1.VL_END_DTM AND S2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{itmGrpCd} ) )
AND D2.PD_PRP_VAL36 = #{svMatGrpCd}
AND D1.PD_CD LIKE #{itmPdCd}|| '%'
AND D1.PD_ABBR_NM LIKE '%' || #{itmPdNm} || '%' ESCAPE '\'
AND D1.SAP_MAT_CD >= LPAD(#{strtSapCd}, 18, '0')
AND D1.SAP_MAT_CD <= LPAD(#{endSapCd}, 18, '0')
AND D1.SAP_MAT_CD IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY D1.PD_CD

SELECT T1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_APLC_IZ T1 /* 품목신청내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON T2.HGR_WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON T3.BASE_YM = T2.APY_YM AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('21', '31', '32') AND T3.PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND T1.ITM_KND_CD = #{itmKndCd} AND T1.APLC_SN = #{aplcList}
SELECT WARE_DTL_DV_CD /* 창고상세구분코드 */ , WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{wareNo}
SELECT WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드*/ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo}
